General.Name: Dgenx Co. Ltd
General.Description: Dgenx Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells exhaust system mufflers for cars in South Korea and internationally. The company was formerly known as Dongwon Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dgenx Co., Ltd. in May 2012. Dgenx Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Siheung, South Korea.
